about_the_game:
HEAVY AS STONE is an investigative horror RPG set in 1920s prohibition-era America, inspired by Robert W. Chambers’ The King in Yellow. Play as Amir, a life insurance adjuster suffering from a mysterious affliction spreading through the town of Terminal.

Investigate the circumstances of their death. Assign a payout.

Your clients are dead or missing. Locate scenes using your case book and build a coherent narrative using what you learn about each client, the town, and its people. Your decision becomes truth, and you must face the consequences.

Navigate a dangerous city.

The dark underbelly of Terminal hides not only drug and alcohol bootleggers, but also the cult-like followers of the yellow sign and sufferers of the very same illness as you.
Do what you need to in order to survive, but beware the toll that irreparable acts of violence take on your mind.

Adapt to your illness.

Your disease, known as the "yellow wound", causes a number of morphing symptoms and hallucinations that can harm your physical and mental health, making it difficult to do your job.



  • You will develop Afflictions as you explore, affecting how you navigate the world around you.
  • Study Afflictions to learn how to combat them, and to gain Adaptations that help offset the negative effects.
  • Intentionally afflict yourself to make use of these Adaptations, provided you can control and combat the Affliction.
  • You are seemingly unable to die. Every death leads back to a yellow sign, yet everything done in that failed life seems to have actually happened. The resulting clairvoyance sickness isn't easy to shake off.

Reap the consequences.

As you explore Terminal and engage in dialogue with its people throughout your investigations, you will come to learn the weight of your decisions, and unveil the ties each case has to your own unending fate.

content_descriptors.notes: Although shown as marionettes, the game contains scenes depicting suicide and murder, whether in real-time or the aftermath, including blood and gore. In addition, the game contains multiple references and depictions of drug abuse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Investigate a series of deaths on behalf of the Atsmith Life Insurance Co., uncovering the relationship between these cases and the cause of your mysterious illness. Adapt to your disease and survive Terminal's seedy underbelly as you face the consequences of your search for answers.
